name: Jetix Puzzle Buzzle
description:
Back of Case - PlayStation 2 (UK) (from Ad Blurbs)

Build a high tower from falling pieces of all shapes and sizes before the rising water below destroys your progress in this fun and frantic puzzle game!

Jump up to catch the shape you need, rotate it and place it in your tower without leaving gaps. To win, you must reach the top before your opponent does!

4 BONUS GAME MODES!
Demolish your opponent's tower in the explosive Bomb Mode and last as long as possible in Survival Play!

TRICKS BRICKS!
Create incredible combos to score big points, and collect bonus bricks to earn extraordinary powers!

MULTIPLAYER FUN!
Compete against a friend to see who'll become crowned Puzzle Buzzle champion!
